text:
<color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1011)@</color>
 
以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(781)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，並召喚 <color=#ccffcc>9</color>隻  <color=#4cc769>白馬義從</color>加入我軍。

  <color=#4cc769>白馬義從</color>屬性
<color=#FFE787>體力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1201)@</color>   <color=#FFE787>武力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1201)@</color>
